list.title: Demand List
list.searchPlaceholder: Search by demand no or customer name...

create.title: Create New Demand
create.submit: Save Demand and Send for Approval
create.successMessage: Demand has been sent to the approval process.
create.errorMessage: An error occurred while creating the demand.

currencyChange.title: Currency Change
currencyChange.message: When the currency changes, all existing lines will be recalculated according to the new currency. Do you approve this operation?

lines.title: Demand Lines
lines.emptyDescription: Use "Select Stock" or "Add Line" button to add demand lines
lines.required: At least 1 line must be added

delete.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this line?

dialog.title: Exchange Rates
dialog.description: View and edit exchange rate values if needed. Modified rates will not be marked as official rates.

step1.title: Step 1: Demand Information
step1.description: Enter demand header information and exchange rates

exchangeRate.required: At least one exchange rate must be added for non-TRY currencies

try.info: Exchange rate is not required when TRY is selected

step2.title: Step 2: Demand Lines
step2.info: You must add at least one line

validation.noLines: At least one line must be added
validation.invalidLines: All lines must have valid information

approval.info: The demand will be automatically sent to the approval process after saving
